title: ICMP Check
description: A configuration for a check that uses the ICMP protocol.

host.description: The IP or hostname of the host to run the ICMP check against.

count.description: The number of ICMP echo requests to send per check.

allowPacketLoss.description: Whether an echo reply must be received for every echo request sent in order for the check to pass. If false, a certain percentage of requests do not have to receive replies for the check to still pass.

percent.description: The minimum percentage of echo requests that must receive echo replies for the check to pass.
